Public Remarks: Buy a furnished rentable condo for less than a car. This ground floor fully furnished studio condo is located in Granisle, BC on the shores of Lake Babine. You are able to put this condo in the rental pool of the “Granisle Resort” or keep it for your personal use. Do a search for “Granisle Resort” on Google and Booking.com. Lake view from the newly installed patio door. The heated crawl space provides ample storage with a power outlet available. New outlets, switches, windows, lights, and faucets, have been installed. One small pet and rentals are allowed. The fishing in Babine Lake is excellent. It is the longest natural lake in British Columbia, Canada and is located northeast of the town of Burns Lake in central British Columbia, some 177 km west northwest of the city of Prince George.

There is also a 3 bay machine shed and loafing barn.  The 180 deep well has never run out, despite watering the 20 mature livestock that have grazed the property year round.

Public Remarks: Stunning restoration and renovation of this classic Shaughnessy Home. The renovated open kitchen offers great storage with a kitchen office, pantry, high quality appliances and an eating area.  The second level has four corner bedrooms, all are large.  The fourth level can be used as office or more bedrooms.  Below is finished with an oversized rec room, office and storage.  The garden has been professionally landscaped with multiple seating areas, ideal for warm, summer nights.  Secure gated driveway with open parking as well as a double garage.  Easy access to great schools and transit.
